borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div>The scale, siting and design of the proposed development<span arial="">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px;">fails </span>to accord&nbsp;with&nbsp;the established local character. dormer extension including roof alteration to the existing side extension.
